MudletPackage:
-
-
Fury Events
-
FuryEventHandler
function FuryEventHandler() local x = prettywrite(gmcp.IRE.CombatMessage) local type,attack,stance = string.match(x, '"(%a+)[.+]? (%a+)"') if stance then echo('\nstance:'..stance) end if not stance thenif type == 'blade' thenif attack == 'gutrend' thengutrend()elseif attack == 'swiftcut' thenSwiftcut()elseif attack == 'legspike' thenLegspike()elseif attack == 'sweep' thenSweep()elseif attack == 'assail' thenAssail()elseif attack == 'sear' thenSear()elseif attack == 'wound' thenWound()elseif attack == 'drive' thenDrive()elseif attack == 'concuss' thenConcuss()elseif attack == 'pummel' thenPummel()elseif attack == 'cleave' thenCleave()elseif attack == 'rend' thenRend()elseif attack == 'sunder' thenSunder()elseif attack == 'hew' thenHew()elseif attack == 'salvo' thenSalvo()elseif attack == 'flamebound' thenFlamebound()elseif attack == 'sting' thenSting()elseif attack == 'blitz' thenBlitz()elseif attack == 'asymmety' thenAsymmetry()elseif attack == 'rupture' thenRupture()elseif attack == 'hypertension' thenHypertension()elseif attack == 'bloodsinge' thenBloodsinge()elseif attack == 'bloodburn' thenBloodburn()elseif attack == 'bombard' thenBombard()elseif attack == 'cripple' thenCripple()elseif attack == 'barrage' thenBarrage()elseif attack == 'raindown' thenRaindown()elseif attack == 'heartrend' thenHeartrend()elseecho('You are unprepared for this IRE message attack!: '..attack)endelseif type == 'rage' thenif attack == 'strike' thenStrike()elseif attack == 'deflect' thenDeflect()elseif attack == 'unstopppable' thenUnstoppable()elseif attack == 'resistant' thenResistant()elseif attack == 'uppderland' thenUpperlash()elseif attack == 'stun' thenStun()elseif attack == 'reel' thenReel()elseif attack == 'flyinglash' thenFlyinglash()elseif attack == 'berserk' thenBerserk()elseif attack == 'daze' thenDaze()elseif attack == 'aftershock' thenAftershock()elseif attack == 'proptoss' thenProptoss()elseif attack == 'grapple' thenGrapple()elseif attack == 'topple' thenTopple()elseif attack == 'sandblast' thenSandblast()elseif attack == 'flyingcut' thenFlyingcut()elseif attack == 'airleap' thenAirleap()elseif attack == 'deepstrike' thenDeepstrike()elseif attack == 'rend' thenRend()elseif attack == 'airflip' thenAirflip()elseif attack == 'expose' thenExpose()elseif attack == 'slice' thenSlice()elseif attack == 'quake' thenQuake()elseif attack == 'judgement' thenJudgement()elseif attack == 'shatter' thenShatter()elseif attack == 'overwhelm' thenOverwhelm()elseif attack == 'twist' thenTwist()elseif attack == 'position' thenPosition()elseif attack == 'throw' thenThrow()elseif attack == 'overpower' thenOverpower()elseecho('You are unprepared for this IRE message RAGE!: '..attack)endelseif type == 'kith' thenelseecho('You are unprepared for this IRE message boy!')end else end end

gmcp.IRE.CombatMessage

BFSymmetry
function BFSymmetry() symStrikeCount = symStrikeCount + 1 end registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.IRE.CombatMessage['blade gutrend']", "Gutrend") registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.IRE.CombatMessage['blade swiftcut']", "Swiftcut")

-
Rupture
function Rupture() echo('\n{{{{{{{{{{{{{{Rupture}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}') bleedcount = bleedcount + 1 local bonusbleeds = math.floor(bleedcount/4) if bonusbleeds >= 1 then bleedcount = bleedcount + bonusbleeds end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.IRE.CombatMessage['blade rupture']", "Rupture")

-
Bloodburn
function Bloodburn() echo('\nBloodburn') if bleedcount >=5 then bleedcount = bleedcount + 3 elseif bleedcount >= 3 then bleedcount = bleedcount + 2 else bleedcount = bleedcount +1 end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.IRE.CombatMessage['blade bloodburn']", "Bloodburn")

Unstoppable
function Unstoppable() echo('start timers') tempTimer(5,[[echo('\n5')]]) tempTimer(10,[[echo('\n10')]]) tempTimer(15,[[echo('\n15')]]) tempTimer(20,[[echo('\n20')]]) tempTimer(25,[[echo('\n25')]]) tempTimer(30,[[echo('\n30')]]) end registerAnonymousEventHandler("Rynda.Unstoppable", "Unstoppable")
